line.text: Love is my sin and thy dear virtue hate
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Hate of my sin grounded on sinful loving
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: O but with mine compare thou thine own state
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And thou shalt find it merits not reproving
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Or if it do not from those lips of thine
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: That have profaned their scarlet ornaments
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And sealed false bonds of love as oft as mine
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Robbed others beds revenues of their rents
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Be it lawful I love thee as thou lov those
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Whom thine eyes woo as mine importune thee
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Root pity in thy heart that when it grows
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Thy pity may deserve to pitied be
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: If thou dost seek to have what thou dost hide
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: By self-example mayst thou be denied
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
